trans-unit.source: Provides a set of static predefined <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un set di statici predefiniti <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: A font stretch describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font.
trans-unit.target: Estensione di un tipo di carattere descrive il grado in cui un formato di carattere rispetto alle proporzioni normale, ovvero la larghezza originale del rapporto dell'altezza specificato per i glifi nel tipo di carattere.

trans-unit.source: The FontStretches values correspond to the `usWidthClass` definition in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: I valori FontStretches corrispondono al `usWidthClass` definizione il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specifica.

trans-unit.source: The `usWidthClass` represents an integer value between 1 and 9.
trans-unit.target: Il `usWidthClass` rappresenta un valore integer compreso tra 1 e 9.

trans-unit.source: Lower numeric values indicate narrower widths; higher values indicate wider widths.
trans-unit.target: Valori numerici inferiori indicano larghezze maggiori. i valori superiori indicano larghezze maggiori.

trans-unit.source: |Font stretch|usWidthClass|% of normal| |------------------|------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A>|1|50%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A>|2|62.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A>|3|75%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A>|4|87.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>|5|100%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>|5|100%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A>|6|112.5%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A>|7|125%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A>|8|150%| |<xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A>|9|200%| For more information on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` value, see the ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) section of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification.
trans-unit.target: | Estensione del carattere | usWidthClass | % Normal | |------------------|------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A>|1|50%| | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A>|&2; | il&62;,5% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A>|3|75%| | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A>|&4; |&87;,5% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>|&5; |&100;% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>|&5; |&100;% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A>|&6; | il&112;,5% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A>|&7; |&125;% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A>|8|&150;% | | <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A>|&9; |&200;% | Per ulteriori informazioni sul [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] `usWidthClass` valore, vedere il ["Font File Tables"](http://www.microsoft.com/typography/otspec/otff.htm) sezione del [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_opentype](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specifica.</xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Expanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiExpanded%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.SemiCondensed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Condensed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.ExtraCondensed%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.UltraCondensed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies a condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un oggetto concentrato <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Condensed represents 75% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta ridotta al 75% delle proporzioni normali del formato di carattere.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta un oggetto concentrato <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un espanso <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Expanded represents 125% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta espanso 125% delle proporzioni normale del formato di carattere.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta un espanso <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an extra-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un molto ridotta <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ExtraCondensed represents 62.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: ExtraCondensed rappresenta il 62,5% delle proporzioni normali del formato di carattere.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an extra-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta un molto ridotta <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an extra-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un oggetto extra espanso <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ExtraExpanded represents 150% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: ExtraExpanded rappresenta 150% delle proporzioni normale del formato di carattere.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an extra-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta un oggetto extra espanso <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a medium <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un supporto <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Medium represents the normal (100%) aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: Media rappresenta (100%) proporzioni normali del formato di carattere.

trans-unit.source: The value of Medium is equivalent to the value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di supporto è equivalente al valore di <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a medium <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta un supporto <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a normal <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica una normale <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Normal represents the normal (100%) aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: Normale rappresenta (100%) proporzioni normali del formato di carattere.

trans-unit.source: The value of Normal is equivalent to the value of <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore normale è equivalente al valore di <xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.FontStretches.Medium%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a normal <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta una normale <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semi-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un semi-concentrato <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SemiCondensed represents 87.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: SemiCondensed rappresenta 87,5% delle proporzioni normali del formato di carattere.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a semi-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta un semi-concentrato <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a semi-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un semi-espanso <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: SemiExpanded represents 112.5% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: SemiExpanded rappresenta il 112,5% delle proporzioni normali del formato di carattere.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents a semi-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta un semi-espanso <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an ultra-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un oggetto extra concentrato <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: UltraCondensed represents 50% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: UltraCondensed rappresenta il 50% delle proporzioni normale del formato di carattere.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an ultra-condensed <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta un oggetto extra concentrato <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an ultra-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un ultra-espanso <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: UltraExpanded represents 200% of the normal aspect ratio of the font form.
trans-unit.target: UltraExpanded rappresenta 200% delle proporzioni normali del formato di carattere.

trans-unit.source: A value that represents an ultra-expanded <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta un ultra-espanso <xref href="System.Windows.FontStretch"> </xref>.
